name: Shape of America: Episode One
description: Shape of America is a story-driven, non-linear, turn-based role-playing game about politics. The story is set the United States in the late 1990s, you are a young man who unwittingly finds himself tied up in all the important economic and political changes of the period.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2,0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1500 MB available space
